info.name: Disney api REST
info.description:
# Introduction
This api allows to explore the world of Disney. Allow knowing and modifying the characters that compose it and knowing in which movies they participated.

# Overview
Used JSON format to send and receive data

# Authentication
Register and login provides an access token valid for one hour.

request.description: User login. Returns a token valid for 1 hour. Then you must login again.
User registration. Returns a token valid for 1 hour. Then you must login again.

- Return all films: title, creation date and image of all Disney films in database.
path: /api/v1/films

- Return film details : return all details of one film selected by name.
example path: /api/v1/films?id=Pinocchio

- Filter films by genre: Return all films of specified genre.
example path: /api/v1/films?genre=Fantasy

- Order by date: Order all films by ascendet or descendet creation date.
ascendent: /api/v1/films?date=asc
descendent: /api/v1/films?date=desc

response.name: Filter By Genre
response.body:
{
    "films": {
        "Toy Story 2": {
            "id": 8,
            "title": "Toy Story 2",
            "genre": "Animation",
            "creationdate": "1999-11-24",
            "calification": 4,
            "imageurl": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/e2/Toy_Story_2_logo.svg/330px-Toy_Story_2_logo.svg.png",
            "characters": [
                "Buzz Lightyear",
                "Woody",
                "Jessie",
                "Rex",
                "Hamm"
            ]
        },
        "Toy Story 3": {
            "id": 9,
            "title": "Toy Story 3",
            "genre": "Animation",
            "creationdate": "2010-06-18",
            "calification": 5,
            "imageurl": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Toy_Stoy_3_logo.svg/330px-Toy_Stoy_3_logo.svg.png",
            "characters": [
                "Buzz Lightyear",
                "Woody",
                "Jessie",
                "Rex",
                "Hamm",
                "Slinky"
            ]
        }
    }
}

request.description: Add new film to database. Use Json format to specify: title, genre, characters[], calification, creationdate and imageurl of new film.

Update a film from database. Use Json format to specify: the properties you want to change.
path: /api/v1/films/1

Delete film of database with id. 
example path: /api/v1/films/1

response.name: Delete Film

request.description:
- Return all characters: return name and image of all Disney characters in database.
path: /api/v1/characters

- Return character details : return all details of one character selected by name.
example path: /api/v1/character?name=Pinocchio

- Filter characters by age: Return all characters with specified range of ages.
max and min: /api/v1/characters?minage=4&maxage=18
only max age = /api/v1/characters?maxage=18
only min age = /api/v1/characters?minage=4

- Filter characters by weigth: Return all characters with specified range of weigth.
max and min: /api/v1/characters?minweigth=4&maxweigth=18
only max weigth = /api/v1/characters?maxweigth=18
only min weigth = /api/v1/characters?minweigth=4

- Filter characters by film: return all charaters of a specified film.
example: /api/v1/characters?film=Pinocchio

response.name: Return character details
Filter by age
Filter by weigth

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Jafar",
    "age": 48,
    "weigth" : 75,
    "story" : "Jafar is generally somewhat comical and daring, even in his evil and cunning days.",
    "imageurl": "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/disney/images/5/56/Jafar.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/310?cb=20130320172756&path-prefix=es"
    
}

request.description: Add new character to database. Use Json format to specify: name, age, weigth, story and image url of new character.

response.name: Add New Character

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Jafar",
    "age": 48,
    "weigth" : 75,
    "story" : "Jafar is generally somewhat comical and daring, even in his evil and cunning days.",
    "imageurl": "https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/disney/images/5/56/Jafar.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/310?cb=20130320172756&path-prefix=es"
    
}

request.description:
Update a character from database. Use Json format to specify: the properties you want to change.
example path: /api/v1/characters/2

Delete character of database with id. 
example path: /api/v1/characters/1

response.name: Delete Character
